Name: Trent Arian
Details: Born 3001. A member of ComStar since before the Fourth Succession War broke out, Trent Arian served in the Com Guards for decades. After the Hegemony was born in 3039, Arian served as an advisor for the newly formed Terran Hegemony Armed Forces. When the Word of Black Schism took place, Arian split off to join the Word and served as their first Precentor-Martial.
